entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bay Roberts
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Rain or snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow or rain changing to rain and ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Fog patches developing this afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers this evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Monday 30 January 2023
